page.title: 08Supernatural in Heybridge
page.content:
The ghost of Scraley Road This ghost has been sighted on several occasions and although silent appears to be the ghost of a farm worker who has been stabbed in the back with a pitchfork.
The ghosts of Boucherne This is a house on Holloway Road which is believed to have once been the site of a Roman burial ground. A ghost of a young boy has been seen in one room and the silhouette of a hanging man in another.
The ghost of Garden Cottage This is a restored cottage on the site of an older house destroyed by fire. The ghost of a boy warning of a fire and objects moving have been reported.
